title: Credit card spends and loan growth slow as lenders get cautious about asset quality: Nomura
description: Credit card spending and loan growth are slowing down as lenders become cautious about asset quality, according to a Nomura report. The Reserve Bank of India data for August 2024 shows a decline in the number of new cards issued and overall spending. The upcoming festive season may offer a temporary boost, but significant growth is unlikely.
